result.title: Request for Advice on Coaching
result.content:
I'd like advice for coaching teams for competitive programming effectively. It's as simple as that.

I've been coaching some of the best teams in my country for a few years now. Unfortunately, there is a notable lack of algorithms and competitive programming expertise here. That leaves students at a disadvantage. Their performance in the ACM ICPC is historically poor â€” the best team solved 2 problems at a regional round. So I'd like to find out how to better prepare them.
